title: Bedspread (USA), 1814
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave with weft looping
description: Bedspread with a large central square containing an eight-pointed star with geometrical shapes and stylized sprigs. Two broad borders, the inner has a heavy looped serpentine with an eight-pointed star in each curve. Zigzag, X-shaped and diamond-shaped borders. Lower left hand corner had four initials, only the "M" remains. The date 1814 was torn out and patched in the bedspread.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bedspread (USA), 1814. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave with weft looping. 
1954-39-1
